<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "How shall the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> come to <S%H935>me?<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H5493>move<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to be with him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> carried it <S%H5186>aside<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite.<s%>

It was <S%H5375>so,<s%> that, when those who bore the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6805>gone<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6806>paces,<s%> he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and a fattened <S%H4806>calf.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> and with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>

It was <S%H727>so,<s%> as the ark of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> that <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> out at the <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6339>leaping<s%> and <S%H3769>dancing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and she <S%H959>despised<s%> him in her <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in its <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for <S%H1732>it;<s%> and David <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

When <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

He <S%H2505>gave<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even among the whole <S%H5971>multitude<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both to <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> to <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2471>portion<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H829>dates,<s%> and <S%H809>raisins.<s%> So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

I will be yet more <S%H7043>vile<s%> than <S%H2063>this,<s%> and will be <S%H8217>base<s%> in my own <S%H5869>sight.<s%> But of the <S%H519>handmaids<s%> of whom you have <S%H559>spoken,<s%> they shall honor <S%H3513>me.<s%>"
